scripts.2json: mkdir -p assets/data && cat assets/data-src/providers-december-2019.csv | yarn run csvtojson > assets/data/providers.json
scripts.rm1stlinefromjson: sed '1d' assets/data/providers.json > assets/data/providers.json.tmp && mv assets/data/providers.json.tmp assets/data/providers.json
scripts.everything: yarn run 2json && yarn run rm1stlinefromjson && yarn run buildindex && yarn run cpcriteria && yarn run cpdeps
